content: Have you been overeating fast food recently? Noticing that you aren’t monitoring fluid intake between treatments? Talk to your renal dietitian and devise a plan to crush your nutrition goals! Happy National Nutrition Month! Take time to thank your fantastic dietitian this month. title: National Nutrition Month: Essential Tips for Dialysis Patients
